mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tin pillbox
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Laboratoire Nativelle [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The top if the red tin reads: "Academie de Medecine de Paris Prix orfila - Prix desportes, Granules au 1/10 de Milligr. Digitaline crist. Nativelle, Principe actif. pur defini et invariable de la Digitale, Laboratoire Nativelle, 49 Bd de Port-Royal, Paris."
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medicine--Drugs-Packaging
